summary: E.R.S.O. (aka Erkeil Real Skyrim Overhaul) is REBORN. Updated and developed, this classical Skyrim overhaul is back, enhanced and fixed.
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://skyrimgems.com/][img]http://i2.imageban.ru/out/2012/11/24/6da4bd5ca75462c15a8c28d7ee40e1cc.png[/img][/url]


[url=http://www.pcgamer.com/best-skyrim-mods/][img]http://static.spark.futureusmedia.com/pc-gamer/apple-touch-icon-180x180-precomposed.4367af8e8aa8.png[/img][/url]
[font=Trebuchet MS][color=#00ff00][size=3](FOR "ENHANCED MIGHTY DRAGONS MODULE")[/size][/color][/font]



[img]http://erkeilmods.altervista.org/skyrim/wp-content/uploads/ERSO-620x300.jpg[/img][/center]

[font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][b][color=#ffff00]INDEX[/color][/b][color=#ffff00]

1. What “was” E.R.S.O.?
2. ERSO pillars                          
3. Now ERSO is REBORN           
4. Installing ERSO REBORN      
5. Other suggested mods           
6. Compatibility notes               
7. Credits 
8. Reborn mods available[/color]           


[color=#ffff00][b]1. WHAT WAS E.R.S.O.?[/b][/color]
ERSO aka “Erkeil Real Skyrim Overhaul” was one of the first Skyrim overhauls. It was born some month after “[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9286/?]T3nd0s Skyrim Redone[/url]”, in 2012. The goal of ERSO was to enhance vanilla Skyrim for giving to player the [u]best experience of vanilla game[/u]. All changes to game mechanics had finalized to transform vanilla Skyrim into Erkeil idea of it, pointing to an old school concept of the game, with a medium-hard difficulty.
ERSO was completely modular. Players could choosing to install from 1 to 40 modules (with hundreds of variants) for enhancing some or a lot of vanilla specifics. The modularity assured a great compatibility with other mods, moreover player’s chance to configure his own ERSO way, according to the best freedom of choices.
ERSO was totally script-free. In whole his production, the Author avoided using scripts, by this way he gave to player the chance for install/uninstall his mods safely. Moreover, avoiding to add new scripts reduces CTD (crash to desktop) risks, granting more stability to Skyrim.  

[color=#ffff00]2.[b]ERSO PILLARS[/b] [/color]
a) ERSO is as Skyrim vanilla had to be from the start. 
b) ERSO is totally (or as less as possible) script-free. 
c) ERSO is totally modular. 
d) ERSO makes Skyrim an hard game, according to old school RPG concept of “experience progression”: at first levels player is very weak respect all enemies. Growing his level and powers, player become stronger than a lot of enemies. But also at very high levels, there will be always some challenging and dangerous enemies to fight. So that he may die in combat from
the start to the end of the game.

[color=#ffff00][b]3. [/b][b]NOW ERSO IS REBORN[/b] [/color]
After about three years, ERSO is returned with some changes, to assure his “actuality” and “maintainability”. A lot of ERSO modules have been updated and published by me (more other Authors) and they may be used as standalone mods. Some ERSO modules weren’t anymore useful, in my opinion, so that I haven’t republished them (but you may find them in original [url=http://erkeilmods.altervista.org/skyrim/category/news/]Erkeil site[/url]). Moreover, according to Erkeil suggestions into last original ERSO version (16.7), I have selected some essential mods on Nexus, by different Authors, for giving to players a finally complete ERSO game experience. To maintain easily updated ERSO modules, I have to maintain them separate. If I create a single ERSO installer (about 2.5 GB of contents), also for minimal changes to a single module I should spend hours to upload on Nexus database the whole file. This would be crazy, and I can’t afford it. Sorry.
So [color=#ffff00]ERSO REBORN[/color] [color=#00ffff]is an accurate list of mods to install for giving you an enhanced version of vanilla Skyrim, according to original Skyrim lore and based on ERSO pillars and mods.   [/color][url=http://www.pcgamer.com/best-skyrim-mods/]

[/url][color=#ffff00][b]4. [/b][b]INSTALLING ERSO REBORN[/b]  [/color]
[b][u]
Installing process and load order[/u][/b]  

1. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19/?]Unofficial Skyrim Patch[/url] by UPPT (if you have vanilla Skyrim)
OR (pick only one)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71214/?]Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch[/url] by UPPT (if you have all DLCs) [i]
Required by some core ERSO modules.[/i]

2. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34093/?]Weapons and Armor Fixes Remade[/url] by kryptopyr [i]
Required by some ERSO weapons & armors changes. [/i] 

3. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43053/?]Clothing and Clutter Fixes[/url] by kryptopyr [i]
Required by some ERSO clothing & clutter changes.[/i] 

4. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44212/?]Morrowloot[/url] by Trainwiz (or his alternatives as [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50740/?]Morrowloot 4E Edition[/url] by Fuma) 
[i]Core mod for ERSO experience system.[/i] 

5. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18929/?]Treebalance – Heavy Armor Tree (and Light Armor Tree)[/url] by sushisquid [i]
Enhances vanilla Heavy Armor and Light Armor Tree, fully compatible with ERSO “Skyrim NPCs Overhaul”[/i] 

6. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26722/?]Treebalance – Smithing Tree[/url] by sushisquid
OR (pick only one)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33959/?]Smithing Perks Overhaul[/url] (plus [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49791/?]Complete Crafting Overhaul Remade[/url]) by kryptopyr [i]
Enhances vanilla Smithing Tree.[/i] 

7. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18919/?]Treebalance – Speech Tree[/url] by sushisquid [i]
Enhances vanilla Speech Tree.[/i][i] 

[/i]8. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73167/?]Populated Cities Towns Villages Reborn[/url] by Erkeil Team RS [i]
Adds hundreds of new generic NPCs to cities, towns and villages to give you feelings of real life in Skyrim settlements.[/i][i] [/i]

9. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73212/?]Populated Dungeons Caves Ruins Reborn[/url] by Erkeil Team RS [i]
Adds hundreds of new enemies (creatures and NPCs) to various places in Skyrim, to give you more challenge during interior exploration.[/i][i] 

[/i]10. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73177/?]Populated Forts Towers Places Reborn[/url] by Erkeil Team RS [i]
Adds hundreds of new bandits, warlocks, necromancersand undead to forts, towers, coves and roads in Skyrim.[/i] 

11. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74029/?]Populated Imperials Stormcloaks Battles[/url] by adolphen [i]
Adds an Imperial Army plus a Stormcloak Army that search minor enemy patrols and do great battle when they meet.[/i]

12. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73186/?]Populated Lands Roads Paths Reborn[/url] by Erkeil Team RS [i]
Adds knights, refugee, travelers, pilgrims, mercenaries, and much more to Skyrim roads.[/i] 

13. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73221/?]Populated Skyrim Civil War Reborn[/url] by Erkeil Team RS 
[i]Adds dynamic and immersive Imperial and Stormcloacks patrols to Skyrim holds. Fully compatible with [/i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12977/?][i]Immersive Patrols[/i][/url][i] by Scrabbulor.[/i][i] [/i]

14. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73194/?]Populated Skyrim Prisons Cells Reborn[/url] by Erkeil Team RS [i]Adds dozens of new prisoners to Skyrim cells, with some surprises.[/i][i] [/i]

15. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73285/?]Vanilla Races Redone Reborn[/url] by Erkeil 
[i]Changes all race specifics, according to lore, for differentiating them and their chance of specialization. ERSO core mod.[/i][i] 

[/i]16. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73495/?]Enhanced Fauna and Monsters Reborn[/url] by Erkeil [i]
Enhances all vanilla animals and monsters without using scripts. Better AI, better specifics, new diseases, more powers, all
vanilla faction issues solved and much more. It’ a core ERSO mod NOT compatible with [/i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10175/?][i]Skytest[/i][/url][i] or [/i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60222/?][i]Animal Tweaks[/i][/url][i].[/i][i] 

[/i]17. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73224/?]Enhanced Mighty Dragons Reborn[/url] by Erkeil [i]
Most famous Dragon and Dragon Priest overhaul without using scripts for Skyrim.[/i][i] 2nd Nexus mod of the month on April 2013, best [/i][url=http://www.pcgamer.com/best-skyrim-mods/#page-6][i]PC GAMER[/i][/url][i] Dragon Overhaul all-time. What can I write more?[/i][i] [/i]

18. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73272/?]Real Unleveled Skyrim Reborn[/url] by Erkeil [i]
Changes Skyrim into a new unleveled world. Now draugr, vampire, werewolf, warlock and necromancer lairs are truly dangerous places. Almost impossible for low level character. ERSO core mod.[/i]

19. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73314/?]Supreme Miraak Reborn[/url] by Erkeil [i]
Enhances Dragonborn DLC final boss.[/i][i] [/i]

20. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73317/?]Supreme Harkon Reborn[/url] by Erkeil 
[i]Enhances Dawnguard DLC final boss.[/i][i] 

[/i]21. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73141/?]Lord of the Dead Reborn[/url] by Erkeil 
[i][u]It’s only a suggested[/u][/i][i], but NOT core, mod. LTDR overhauls vanilla necromancy system. Fully compatible with [/i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40607/?][i]Undeath[/i][/url][i].[/i][i] 

[/i]22. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73797/?]Skyrim NPCs Overhaul Reborn[/url] by Erkeil [i]
It’s the true core of ERSO. Almost all vanilla generic and unique NPCs changed. Now your enemies use racial powers, perks, more vanilla spells, have a static level of experience and, in general, are tougher. Must have.[/i][i] [/i]

23. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73346/?]Erkeil’s Better Level Progression Reborn[/url] by Erkeil 
[i]Re-balances the experience progression curve forgiving a more logical and equilibrated skill development to your character. It’an ERSO core mod.[/i][i] [/i]

24. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73378/?]Realistic Merchant Stocks Reborn[/url] by Erkeil [i]
Reduces special and normal item quantities into all Merchant stocks. It’s an ERSO core mod, considering that in Skyrim there are too much strong items and gold. It’s a compendium of Morrowloot or Morrowloot 4E.[/i][i] [/i]

25. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73363/?]Erkeil’s Training Cost More Expensives[/url] by Erkeil 
[i]Rises training cost sessions, considering training a vanilla cheat to enhance your character without fighting/exploring.[/i][i] [/i]

26. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73522/?]Enhanced Legendary Weapons and Armors Reborn[/url] by Erkeil [i]
Enhances Legendary Weapons and Armors, now truly legendary. [/i][i] 

[/i]27. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73344/?]Erkeil’s Respawn Settings Reborn[/url] by Erkeil [i]
Choose your preferred respawn setting combination.[/i][i] 

[/i]28. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73366/?]Standing Stones Overhaul Reborn[/url] by Erkeil [i]
Overhauls vanilla Standing Stone gifts.[/i][i] [/i]

29. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73365/?]Skyrim Sounds and Musics Reborn[/url] by Erkeil [i]
E[/i][i]liminates the cave/mine/dungeon/fort and ruin loops;adds a short silence between 2 different music and sound effect tracks; vanilla music tracks are partially replaced and new tracks has been added; adds new sound effects; all new music and sound effects are differentiated by dungeon kind. [u]It’s an optional file[/u].[/i][i] [/i]

30. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73424/?]Better Enchanting Perks Tree Reborn[/url] by Erkeil
OR (pick only one)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42796/?]Enchanting Awakened[/url] by egocarib [i]
Enhances vanilla Enchanting Perks Tree. It’s an ERSO core mod.[/i][i] 

[/i]31. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73286/?]Realistic Fall Damages Reborn[/url] by Erkeil 
[i]Now falling is realistic and dangerous, for player and NPCs. [/i][i]It’s an ERSO core mod.[/i][i] 

[/i]32. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73425/?]Dragon Priest Mask Overhaul Reborn[/url] by Erkeil 
[i]Overhauls Dragon Priest Masks giving them new powers and weaknesses.[/i][i] [/i]

33. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73172/?]Enhanced Enemy AI Reborn[/url] by Erkeil [i]
1st Nexus mod of the month on June 2013. Highly compatible, lite, script-free mod to enhance a lot your fights. The mod
changes only animal, monster and NPCs combat styles. Compatible with [/i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2700/?][i]Duel[/i][/url][i], [/i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5485/?][i]Deadly Combat[/i][/url][i], and most of other combat mods. Really a MUST HAVE, so ERSO core mod.[/i][i] 

[/i]34. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4374/?]Better Magic[/url] by Sushisquid [i]
Overhauls excellently vanilla Magic system without using scripts.[/i][i] 
[/i]
35. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5485/?]Deadly Combat[/url] by Borgut1337 [i]
Overhauls excellently vanilla combat system, plus very good combo with EEAIR.[/i][i] [/i]

36. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27531/?]Dragon Soul Relinquishment[/url] by Alek [i]
Converts dragon souls to perk or shout points.[/i][i] [/i]

37. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55677/?]Loot and Degradation[/url] by Isoku [i]
Overhauls loot system and NPCs loot corpses. Introduces a degradation system. I suggest to eliminate magic loots to generic NPCs.[/i][i] [/i][i]

[/i]38. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11481/?]Phitts Alchemy and Food Overhaul[/url] by Phitt
OR (pick only one)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69306/?]Complete Alchemy and Cooking Overhaul[/url] by kryptopyr [i]
Enhances vanilla alchemy and cooking system.[/i][i] [/i]

39. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10456/?]Path of Shadows[/url] by Grimwolf [i]
Overhauls stealth and lock picking system.[/i][i] 

[/i]40. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6307/?]Armor affects magic[/url] by Phitt [i]
MUST HAVE. Really extremely underrated gem to give sense to play as a pure mage in Skyrim. Now each piece of light and heavy armor decreases your magicka for spells. ERSO core mod.[/i][i] 

[/i]41. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34612/?]Trade Barter[/url] by kryptopyr [i]
Overhauls vanilla Skyrim system. I suggest this barter ratio: min 3,5 - max 7.[/i][i] 

[/i]42. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1175/?]Skyrim -Community- Uncapper[/url] by Elys 
[i][u]You have to reduce by 40-50% your skill gains.[/u][/i][i] It's an ERSO core mod.[/i][i] [/i][i] 
[/i][i] [/i][i] [/i][i] [/i][i] [/i][i] [/i][/size][/font][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]
[color=#ffff00][b]5.  [/b][b]OTHER SUGGESTED MODS[/b]  [/color]
[b][u]
Install / load before 4) Morrowloot or Morrowloot 4E [/u][/b]

55. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67078/?]HOPo - Horses On Patrol - Extra Orcs[/url] by jayr848
56. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14351/?]Skyrim Sewers 4[/url] by Viltuska

58. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16225/?]Apocalypse[/url] by EnaiSiaion PLUS [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18436/?]ASIS[/url] by TAT (to give new spells to NPCs)[b][u]

[/u][/b][b][u]Install / load after 41) Trade Barter [/u][/b] 

59. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28202/?]Fires Hurt[/url] by abot
60. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9557/?]Alternate Start - Live Another Life[/url] by Arthmoor
61. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56744/?]People are Strangers[/url] by Sagittarius22
62. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36534/?]Bounty Gold[/url] by gorey666
63. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71531/?]Crime Overhaul[/url] by chinagreenelvis
64. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6745/?]Hypothermia[/url] by Nitor PLUS [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67467/?]Hypothermia Plus - Unofficial Upgrade[/url] by Granson
65. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52471/?]Important Information Overhaul[/url] by Apollodown
66. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51473/?]iNeed[/url] by isoku (set timescale to 8)
67. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29979/?]Lock Overhaul[/url] by Quad2Core
68. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49307/?]Sands of Time Sleeping Encounters Standalone Module[/url] by The SOTTeam
69. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37816/?]Weighted Arrow[/url] by Joubarbe
70. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27563/?]Wet and Cold[/url] by isoku
71. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37216/?]Civil War Overhaul[/url] by Apollodown[b] ([/b]after that you have to install [/size][/font][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73797/?]Skyrim NPCs Overhaul Reborn[/url][/size][/font] patch)[b]
72. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63874/?]Immersive Speechcraft[/url] by Sirsalami

[color=#ffff00]6.  [/color][/b][color=#ffff00][b]COMPATIBILITY NOTES[/b] [/color]
ERSO REBORN is compatible with all mods that changes textures & meshes.
ERSO REBORN is compatible with all mods that doesn’t change vanilla edits.
ERSO REBORN is compatible with weather, environmental and lighting mods.
If your mod changes vanilla edits, please use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859/?]TES5EDIT[/url] tools by ElminsterAU to check for eventual conflicts.     

[color=#ffff00][b]7. [/b][b]CREDITS[/b] [/color]
Erkeil did ERSO and all his standalone mods. All credits go to him, for the permission to player and modder community to use his work freely. Thanks! 

[b][color=yellow]8. MODS EDITED BY ADOLPHEN[/color][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73424/?]Better Enchanting Perks Tree Reborn[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73365/?]Skyrim Sounds and Musics Reborn[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73366/?]Standing Stones Overhaul Reborn[/url]
